title: Academic-Vocational Integrated Curriculum for Degree Apprenticeship Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Job-Related Expertise and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on mobile-optimized content design and solving real-life/workplace problems

learning_goals: One can explain the core components of the degree apprenticeship system (academic-vocational integration structure, industry-university collaboration model)
One can create customized learning plans to solve practical problems in mobile microlearning environments
One can present two or more academic-vocational integration strategies applicable to professional settings in their field

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
